tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE outdoor_adventure_reviews (
    review_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    location VARCHAR,
    experience_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE user_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    sport_name VARCHAR(255),
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE sport_experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sport_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    duration_hours INT,
    difficulty_level VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    experience_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE user_reviews (
    review_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    experience_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_reviews (
    review_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    sport_experience_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sport_experience_id INT,
    avg_rating FLOAT,
    num_reviews INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);
